nodes.text: Rakhuuun was a planet that was located in the Rakhuuun system of the Mytaranor sector. It was a part of the Kashyyyk Region, in the Slice portion of the Mid Rim. The Randon Run hyperlane connected the planet to the worlds of Chamble and Kashyyyk.

Rakhuuun was colonized by members of the sentient Wookiee species from nearby Kashyyyk, and was known for a small shipyard in which freighters and yachts of aesthetically pleasing design were manufactured.

Rakhuuun was first mentioned in the 2009 reference book The Essential Atlas, written by Jason Fry and Daniel Wallace. Although the Rakhuuun system, and therefore the planet Rakhuuun, was placed within grid square P-9 by a map in The Essential Atlas, the book's Appendix section listed it as being located in square Q-10, which was repeated in the StarWars.com Online Companion to the book. This article assumes the visual map placement is erroneous and that Q-10 is the correct square.
